added.double_trade_price: • These enchantments get charged twice as much in villager trades.
added.exclusive_set/armor: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/boots: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/bow: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/crossbow: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/damage: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/mining: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.exclusive_set/riptide: • Enchantments in this tag are mutually exclusive.
added.in_enchanting_table: • These enchantments can be obtained from Enchanting Table.
added.on_mob_spawn_equipment: • These enchantments can be found on spawned mobs' equipment.
added.on_random_loot: • These enchantments can be found on naturally generated equipment from loot tables.
added.on_traded_equipment: • These enchantments can be found on equipment sold by villagers.
added.prevents_bee_spawns_when_mining: • Used to prevent bees from coming out when mining Bee Nest or Beehive.
added.prevents_decorated_pot_shattering: • Used to prevent decorated pots from dropping bricks and sherds when broken with a tool.
added.prevents_ice_melting: • Used to prevent Ice turning into water instead of dropping itself when broken.
added.prevents_infested_spawns: • Used to prevent infested blocks from spawning silverfish when broken.
added.smelts_loot: • Dropped items are being processed through minecraft:furnace_smelt item modifier.
added.tooltip_order: • The order of enchantments to display in item's tooltip. Does not change the order in data component format.
added.tradeable: • These enchantments can be sold by villagers.
